EmailTemplate.subject: Need More Accurate Targeting?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Precision. Accuracy. The TALIN™ family of land navigation and pointing systems has proven performance with more than 16,000 fielded systems on over 60 land-based platforms. Platforms include tanks, artillery, light vehicles and marine vessels, as well as other military and civilian applications where precision really counts. Our TALIN™ inertial land navigation technology is available in non ITAR classification. This means our customers can now have access to a selection of our TALIN solutions without the extra paperwork. Arrange a meeting with our experts today to get on target!
BOOK A MEETING <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_TALIN.html]]>
See our portfolio of navigation solutions
<[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_TALIN.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_talin]]>
